alert.note: Alert for Clark; Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Clark and eastern Taylor Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 300 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chelsea to 12 miles east of Medford. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rib Lake around 310 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Wood Lake, The Mondeaux Flowage, Highway 13 And County Road M, Stetsonville, Atwood, County Roads A And E, Highway M And Joe Martin Road, Esadore Lake, Camp Forest Spring and Gad. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
